= Journal 2025-02-15 =

== Astral uv init options ==
:uv:python:

- `uv init --lib lib-name` generates a python library.
- `uv init --package package-name` generates a library with a console entry
  point.
- `uv init --virtual project-name` generates a virtual project which appears
  the same as `uv init --app project-name`.
